Text: To get the trackers to work in this torrent I think you'll have to add a space between each tracker in the list . That's what I had to do in uTorrent .

Also , this is an NTSC VCD mpeg file . If using Vlc you may find it crashes out to yuv output and a black screen (did with me) at around 15 minutes . Seems to work okay so far with WMP but "Total video player" just screws up the audio ie incredibly loud hiss and nowt else .
